name: Peruvilai Jumma Mosque
description: Peruvilai Jumma Mosque, nestled in Kanyakumari district, epitomizes Islamic heritage with its tranquil ambiance and architectural grace. It serves as a pivotal hub for spiritual devotion, communal harmony, and cultural enrichment in the region.
location: 59PX+G7F, Parvathipuram - Asaripallam Rd, Peruvilai, Nagercoil, Tamil Nadu 629003
